[[Erica Bing]] (grandniece) }} '''Lillian''' is the youngest daughter of [[Althea]] and the sister of [[Judy Geller]] and [[Aunt Phylis|Phylis]], thus the sister-in-law of [[Jack Geller]], the aunt of [[Ross Geller|Ross]] and [[Monica Geller|Monica]] and the great-aunt of [[Ben Geller|Ben]], [[Emma Geller-Greene|Emma]], [[Jack Geller-Bing|Jack]] and [[Erica Geller-Bing|Erica]].
